options.name: Personalized
options.description: The image background blur may be affected by plugin changes.

personalized.name: Personalized
personalized.description: Map a dark style to the entire application

auto.name: Auto
auto.description: Follow the system to switch dark mode.

transparent-engine.name: Transparent engine
transparent-engine.description: Map the entire application to a blurry transparent style. Background blur is only supported on Windows.

emphasis.name: Emphasis
emphasis.description: Different emphasis modes are suitable for different people. If the coloring is clear, it is not recommended to enable.

coloring.name: Main color coloring
coloring.description: Color the main colors of the plugin window.

contrast.name: High contrast
contrast.description: Suitable for high-contrast mode of weak vision and light sensitivity.

help.name: Theme help
help.description: Find theme help on official Github Discussions.

account.description: Login and manage your touch account here

open-on-start.name: Open on start
open-on-start.description: Open the application when the system starts

default-app.name: Default application
default-app.description: Open related links with the application

auto.name: Close with deactivation
auto.description: Close debugging tools when plugin window is deactivated

hot-key.name: Hot Keys
hot-key.description: Set functions for all registered key bindings

change-index.name: Switch homepage
change-index.description: Automatically activate if window is not active

change-plugins.name: Switch plugins
change-plugins.description: Automatically activate if window is not active

change-settings.name: Switch settings
change-settings.description: Automatically activate if window is not active

version.update-checking-failed-description: Update check failed. Please check your network connection and try again.
version.update-checking-failed-description-2: Update check failed. Please try again later.
version.update-checking-failed-description-3: Update check failed. Please check your network connection.
